ti.name: Bloodborne
ti.detail: All trophies acquired. Hats off!

ti.name: Yharnam Sunrise
ti.detail: You lived through the hunt, and saw another day.

ti.name: Honouring Wishes
ti.detail:
Captivated by the moon presence,
you pledge to watch over the hunter's dream.

ti.name: Childhood's Beginning
ti.detail:
You became an infant Great One,
lifting humanity into its next childhood.

ti.name: Yharnam, Pthumerian Queen
ti.detail: Defeat Yharnam, Blood Queen of the Old Labyrinth.

ti.name: Hunter's Essence
ti.detail: Acquire all hunter weapons.

ti.name: Hunter's Craft
ti.detail: Acquire all special hunter tools.

ti.name: Weapon Master
ti.detail: Acquire a weapon of the highest level.

ti.name: Blood Gem Master
ti.detail: Acquire an extremely precious blood gem.

ti.name: Rune Master
ti.detail: Acquire an extremely precious Caryll Rune.

ti.name: Cainhurst
ti.detail: Gain entry to Cainhurst, the lost and ruined castle.

ti.name: The Choir
ti.detail:
Gain entry to the realm of the Choir,
the high stratum of the Healing Church.

ti.name: The Source of the Dream
ti.detail:
Discover the abandoned old workshop,
the source of the hunter's dream.

ti.name: Nightmare Lecture Building
ti.detail:
Gain entry into the Byrgenwerth lecture building,
that drifts within the realm of nightmare.

ti.name: Father Gascoigne
ti.detail: Defeat the beast that once was Father Gascoigne.

ti.name: Vicar Amelia
ti.detail: Defeat the beast that once was Vicar Amelia.

ti.name: Shadow of Yharnam
ti.detail: Defeat the Shadow of Yharnam.

ti.name: Rom, the Vacuous Spider
ti.detail: Defeat Great One: Rom, the Vacuous Spider.

ti.name: The One Reborn
ti.detail: Defeat the One Reborn.

ti.name: Micolash, Host of the Nightmare
ti.detail: Defeat Micolash, Host of the Nightmare.

ti.name: Mergo's Wet Nurse
ti.detail: Defeat Great One: Mergo's Wet Nurse.

ti.name: Cleric Beast
ti.detail: Defeat Cleric Beast.

ti.name: Blood-starved Beast
ti.detail: Defeat Blood-starved Beast.

ti.name: The Witch of Hemwick
ti.detail: Defeat the Witch of Hemwick.

ti.name: Darkbeast Paarl
ti.detail: Defeat Darkbeast Paarl.

ti.name: Amygdala
ti.detail: Defeat Great One: Amygdala.

ti.name: Martyr Logarius
ti.detail: Defeat Martyr Logarius.

ti.name: Celestial Emissary
ti.detail: Defeat Great One: Celestial Emissary.

ti.name: Ebrietas, Daughter of the Cosmos
ti.detail: Defeat Great One: Ebrietas, Daughter of the Cosmos.

ti.name: Blood Gem Contact
ti.detail:
Acquire a blood gem that imbues hunter weapons
with special strength.

ti.name: Rune Contact
ti.detail: Acquire a Caryll Rune that endows hunters with special strength.

ti.name: Chalice of Pthumeru
ti.detail:
Acquire the Chalice of Pthumeru that seals the catacombs
that form a web deep below Yharnam.

ti.name: Chalice of Ailing Loran
ti.detail:
Acquire the Chalice of Ailing Loran that seals
the tragic land lost to the sands.

ti.name: Chalice of Isz
ti.detail:
Acquire the Great Chalice of Isz that seals
the home of the cosmic kin.

ti.name: Old Hunter's Essence
ti.detail: Acquire all old hunter weapons.

ti.name: Orphan of Kos
ti.detail: Defeat Great One: Orphan of Kos.

ti.name: Ludwig, the Holy Blade
ti.detail: Defeat the beast that was once Ludwig, the Holy Blade.

ti.name: Lady Maria of the Astral Clocktower
ti.detail: Defeat Lady Maria of the Astral Clocktower.

ti.name: Living Failures
ti.detail: Defeat the failed attempts to become Great Ones.

ti.name: Laurence, the First Vicar
ti.detail: Defeat the beast that was once Laurence, the First Vicar.

gi.description:
Bloodborne is an action-RPG and another member of souls-like title series. The game has no predecessors or successors, making it the only entry with one add-on: “The Old Hunters.” The Bloodborne universe, however, also includes a comics and a board game.

Generally resembling the Dark Souls series, Bloodborne, however, has some different mechanics and the pace of combat is increased thanks to the risk-rewarding battle system. Another difference is multiplayer, which comes in two kinds: you can summon other players into your game and fight bosses side by side or you can fight impostors, who are other players invading your playthrough.

Throughout the game, you are forced to explore an enormous open world of Yharnam, which looks like alternate universe Lovecraft-inspired Victorian-era England, as The Hunter. You meet horrific bosses, explore vast areas, houses and open spaces while continually dodging, attacking and trying not to get killed by a massive number of hostile NPCs.
gi.name: Bloodborne

additional.deck: An action role playing game by FromSoftware, marking the studio's debut on the PlayStation 4. It shares creative roots, as well as gameplay elements, with the Souls series.
additional.name: Bloodborne

characters.name: Lady Maria of the Astral Clocktower
Adella, Nun of the Healing Church
Watch Dog of the Old Lords
